caption.p:
Variations of hematite and goethite content and Hm/(Hm + Gt) along the Jiujiang red earth section. Ke Yin created this figure using Grapher 9 and CorelDRAW14. a-δ 18O records of the equatorial Pacific Core V28-238 adapted from Shackleton and Opdyke, 1973; b- magnetic susceptibility record of the Chinese loess obtained by averaging data from localities Luochuan and Xifeng (Kukla et al.
56 ). (Luochuan County, Shanxi Province) and Xifeng (Xifeng District, Gansu Province) ~360 km to the west.
